steps.prompt_body: Describe the scenario you want to prep for. Include the audience and what you want to achieve.
examples: Delivering Q4 results to the board
Negotiating resources with a cross-functional lead

helper.title: Why this matters
bullets: The more specific you are, the sharper the coach becomes.
Think: who, what, and why it matters.

steps.prompt_title: How intense does this feel right now?
steps.prompt_body: Pick the option that best matches your gut feel.

options.label: Elevated – I feel the stakes rising.

steps.prompt_body: Write the concrete action you'll take to increase control before you walk into the room.
examples: Draft three stakes lines and rehearse them once.
Align with my sponsor on the narrative and risky numbers.

helper.title: Need ideas?
bullets: Perspective: reframe from the audience’s view.
